message: Hi Bob, I propose a split where I receive $550000 and you receive $450000. Since every round brings a 5% devaluation on my end, it's in both our best interests to settle now and secure our gains. Looking forward to your acceptance.

Alice, I understand the devaluation is a concern, but your initial offer was a bit skewed in your favor. Let's be fair to both of us and split the difference. I propose we take $550000 each.  This ensures a more equitable outcome.

Bob, I understand your point. Considering that any delay will mean further devaluation of my share (and likely yours as well), I decide to accept your offer. Let's settle this round with me receiving $450000 and you receiving $550000.
